hero.title: Comparative Analysis of Greek Terms 'eon' and 'eonian'
hero.subtitle: Discover the true meaning of mistranslated terms in the Bible

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: This site presents a comparative analysis of the Greek terms 'eon' (αἰών) and 'eonian' (αἰώνιος) in the New Testament, as well as other terms often mistranslated in conventional Bible versions.
intro.p2: Our analysis is based on the principles of the Keys to the Kingdom Bible (KTK) and compares the original Concordant version, its formal French translation, and the Darby version, highlighting potentially misleading translations.
intro.p3: Navigate through the different sections to explore verses by biblical book and discover detailed analyses.

stats.title: Quick Statistics
stats.books_desc: New Testament books containing these terms
